## IFileSystemCopyFileOptions interface

The options for FileSystem.copyFile()

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IFileSystemCopyFileOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [destinationPath](./node-core-library.ifilesystemcopyfileoptions.destinationpath.md) | <code>string</code> | The path that the object will be copied to. The path may be absolute or relative. |
|  [sourcePath](./node-core-library.ifilesystemcopyfileoptions.sourcepath.md) | <code>string</code> | The path of the existing object to be copied. The path may be absolute or relative. |
